verses.text_plain: Help, Lord; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.
verses.verse_html:
1Help, Lord; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men. ▼
▼ upon…: or, upon the eighth
 , ▼
▼ Help: or, Save

footnotes.body_html: ▼ upon…: or, upon the eighth

verses.text_plain: They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: with flattering lips and with a double heart do they speak.
verses.verse_html:
2They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: with flattering lips and with a double heart do they speak. ▼
▼ a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart

verses.text_plain: The Lord shall cut off all flattering lips, and the tongue that speaketh proud things:
verses.verse_html:
3The Lord shall cut off all flattering lips, and the tongue that speaketh proud things: ▼
▼ proud: Heb. great

verses.text_plain: Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips are our own: who is lord over us?
verses.verse_html:
4Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips are our own: who is lord over us? ▼
▼ are…: Heb. are with us

footnotes.body_html: ▼ are…: Heb. are with us

verses.text_plain: For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the Lord; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him.
verses.verse_html:
5For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the Lord; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him. ▼
▼ puffeth…: or, would ensnare him

footnotes.body_html: ▼ puffeth…: or, would ensnare him

verses.text_plain: The words of the Lord are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.
verses.verse_html: 6The words of the Lord are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt keep them, O Lord, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.
verses.verse_html:
7Thou shalt keep them, O Lord, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever. ▼
▼ them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc

footnotes.body_text: ▼ them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc

verses.text_plain: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.
verses.verse_html:
8The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted. ▼
▼ men: Heb. of the sons of the men

footnotes.body_text: ▼ men: Heb. of the sons of the men
footnotes.body_html: ▼ men: Heb. of the sons of the men
